T10 FOR GEN AI
Project
Contribute
How to Contribute?
The OWASP Top 10 for LLM Applications is an open source effort and we welcome all expert ideas, contributions, suggestions, and remarks.
.
Where to start
Read the project
Charter
Read the
Feedback
to learn more about the different Slack channels, leads for each channel, and how to report an issue.
Read through the previous discussions to learn more about what we are doing and where you may contribute.
Check out the
project Wiki
for more details.
Join our BiWeekly Sync
Meeting Calendar
meeting
Watch previous meetings hosted on our
YouTube
older meetings
here
Join the expert team’s
Slack Channel
and engage in the discussion
Join our main channel
#project-top10-for-llm
for general project discussions on the LLM Top 10
Join our
#team-llm-discuss
channel to sharing relevant links & posts about LLM security (not necessarily Top-10 related)
Join the
#team-llm-*
channels for deeper discussions on individual Top-10 entries
Benefits of  a Global Community
Many hands make light work
Collaborate with awesome people
Flex your skills
Support for your ideas
Where we could use your help
Translation
Publishing
Data Gathering
Web site
OWASP Top 10 for LLM Applications Cybersecurity and Governance Checklist
Do you need to be an OWASP Member to contribute
No, you do not need to be an OWASP member to contribute. But it’s a great community that benefits a large audience and we encourage you to
join!
